document.full_text: a jury in newark, n.j., on tuesday convicted former gang member alexander alfaro of murder in the 2007 schoolyard shooting of four college-bound students, authorities said.
document.title: gang member convicted of execution-style killings
lines_and_colors: a jury in newark, n.j., on tuesday convicted former gang member alexander alfaro of murder in the 2007 schoolyard shooting of four college-bound students, authorities said.
